00018 #ifndef _WRITE_XML_H
00019 #define _WRITE_XML_H
00020 
00021 #include <votca/ctp/qmcalculator.h>
00022 #include <votca/ctp/qmpair.h>
00023 
00024 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00025 
00042 class WriteXML : public QMCalculator{
00043 public:
00044     WriteXML() {};
00045     ~WriteXML() {};
00046 
00047     const char *Description() { return "Writes out data to xml format, TODO: remove this calculator once sqlite is running"; }
00048 
00049     void Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options);
00050 
00051     bool EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top);
00052     void EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top);
00053     
00054 private:
00055     string _outfile;
00056     bool _write_dist, _write_rij, _write_jeff, _write_en, _write_occ, _write_coords, _write_lambdaout;
00057 };
00058 
00059 inline void WriteXML::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options)
00060 {
00061     _outfile = options->get("options.writexml.file").as<string>();
00062     _write_dist = false;
00063 
00064     if(options->exists("options.writexml.dist"))
00065         _write_dist = options->get("options.writexml.dist").as<bool>();
00066 
00067     if(options->exists("options.writexml.rij"))
00068         _write_rij = options->get("options.writexml.rij").as<bool>();
00069 
00070     if(options->exists("options.writexml.jeff"))
00071         _write_jeff = options->get("options.writexml.jeff").as<bool>();
00072 
00073     if(options->exists("options.writexml.site_energies"))
00074         _write_en = options->get("options.writexml.site_energies").as<bool>();
00075 
00076     if(options->exists("options.writexml.occupation"))
00077         _write_occ = options->get("options.writexml.occupation").as<bool>();
00078 
00079     if(options->exists("options.writexml.positions"))
00080         _write_coords = options->get("options.writexml.positions").as<bool>();
00081 
00082     if(options->exists("options.writexml.lambdaout"))
00083         _write_lambdaout = options->get("options.writexml.lambdaout").as<bool>();
00084 
00085 
00086     ofstream out;
00087     out.open(_outfile.c_str(), ios::out);
00088     if(!out)
00089         throw std::runtime_error("error, cannot open " + _outfile);
00090     out << "<qmtop>" << endl;
00091     out.close();
00092 }
00093 
00094 inline void WriteXML::EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top)
00095 {
00096     ofstream out;
00097     out.open(_outfile.c_str(), ios::out | ios::app);
00098     if(!out)
00099         throw std::runtime_error("error, cannot open " + _outfile);
00100     out << "</qmtop>" << endl;
00101     out.close();
00102 }
00103 
00104 inline bool WriteXML::EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top){
00105     ofstream out;
00106     out.open(_outfile.c_str(), ios::out | ios::app);
00107     if(!out)
00108         throw std::runtime_error("error, cannot open " + _outfile);
00109 
00110 
00111     QMNBList &nblist = top->nblist();
00112     vector < QMCrgUnit *> lcharges = top->CrgUnits();
00113     
00114     out << "  <frame>"  << endl;
00115     for(QMNBList::iterator iter = nblist.begin();iter!=nblist.end();++iter) {
00116         out << "    <pair "
00117             << " first=\"" << (*iter)->first->getId() << "\""
00118             << " second=\"" << (*iter)->second->getId() << "\""
00119             << " J=\"";
00120         for(int i=0; i< (*iter)->Js().size(); ++i)
00121             out << (*iter)->Js()[i] << " ";
00122         out << "\""
00123             << " rate12=\"" << (*iter)->rate12() << "\""
00124             << " rate21=\"" << (*iter)->rate21() << "\"";
00125         if(_write_dist)
00126             out << " dist=\"" <<(*iter)->dist()<< "\"";
00127         if(_write_rij)
00128             out << " rij=\"" <<(*iter)->r()<< "\"";
00129         if(_write_lambdaout)
00130             out << " lambdaout=\"" <<(*iter)->getDouble("lambda_outer") << "\"";
00131         if(_write_jeff)
00132             out << " Jeff=\"" <<(*iter)->calcJeff2()<< "\"";
00133         out <<  "/>" << endl;
00134     }
00135         for (vector < QMCrgUnit *>::iterator lch_iter = lcharges.begin();lch_iter!=lcharges.end();++lch_iter) {
00136             out << "    <site "
00137                 << " number=\"" << (*lch_iter)->getId() << "\"";
00138             if (_write_coords) {
00139                 out << " pos=\"" << (*lch_iter)->GetCom() << "\"";
00140             }
00141             if (_write_en) {
00142                 out << " energy=\"" << (*lch_iter)->getTotalEnergy() << "\"";
00143             }
00144             if (_write_occ) {
00145                     out << " occupation=\"" << (*lch_iter)->getOccupationProbability() << "\"";
00146             }
00147             out << "/>" << endl;
00148     }
00149     out << "  </frame>" << endl;
00150 
00151     out.close();
00152 }
00153 
00154 }}
00155 
00156 #endif  /* _WRITE_XML_H */
